name: Tusima
intro: Layer2 controllable privacy financial network based on ZK-Rollup
introduce: Tusima is a Layer2 controllable privacy financial network based on ZK-Rollup. Integrating zero-knowledge proof, iterative proof and homomorphic encryption technology, Tusima performs controllable data privacy functions on the chain and it also supports multi-chain interoperability, protects the privacy of sensitive data for DeFi users and builds a high TPS scalable financial network.
